snippet: Antigovernment protesters in and around Khartoum, the capital, and in other cities clashed with riot police officers on Friday as demonstrations stretched into a third week.
abstract: Demonstrations continue across Sudan, with hundreds of antigovernment protesters clashing with riot police in and around Khartoum.
lead_paragraph: Antigovernment protesters in and around Khartoum, the capital, and in other cities clashed with riot police officers on Friday as demonstrations stretched into a third week.

headline.main: Sudan: Antigovernment Protesters Clash With Police
headline.print_headline: Sudan: Antigovernment Protesters Clash With Police
